last_episode_to_air.name: Consummatum
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jack must make a choice about what he believes; is he experiencing a supernatural event or is it all just a fluke? His choice will decide the fate of Monday the 23rd.

name: Breakers
overview: Jack is reliving the same day over and over again so he seeks help from a therapist, but when Jack discovers a murder and finds himself pursued by gangsters and a psychopath he must find a way to stop the murder or wind up stuck forever.

episodes.name: Monday the 23rd
episodes.overview: Jack is reliving the same day over and over so he seeks help from a therapist and stumbles upon a murder.

episodes.name: Gone
episodes.overview: Jack tries to save the girl he saw murdered the night before by duplicating the day, but he can't seem to find her again.

episodes.name: Coup de grace
episodes.overview: Jack searches for the murdered girl at the campaign office of Paola Foust and hatches a plan to save her before the day resets at midnight.

episodes.name: The Day Before
episodes.overview: Sunday the 22nd. Harper Ross puts a plan in motion to bring down her boss, Paola Foust, but things do not go according to plan.

episodes.name: Push My Button
episodes.overview: Jack tries to find his friends but no one shows up where they normally do. Meanwhile a new villain puts Paola Foust to the test.

episodes.name: The Devil at Your Door
episodes.overview: Together with Harper and Jessica, Jack puts a new plan into motion to end the day, save Harper Ross, and bring down Paola Foust but an unexpected complication arises.

episodes.name: Shoelaces
episodes.overview: Jack teams up with Darwin to put a new theory of why the day is resetting to the test. Jessica teams up with a new friend while Harper takes matters into her own hands.

episodes.name: Leverage
episodes.overview: Jack tests Paola to see if she is aware of the day resetting. Harper deals with a new problem and becomes more paranoid.

episodes.name: The Fifth Man
episodes.overview: Harper urges Jack to do whatever it takes to end things so Jack takes the matters into his own hands and challenges Foust and Darwin to a showdown.

episodes.name: Consummatum
episodes.overview: Jack must make a choice about what he believes; is he experiencing a supernatural event or is it all just a fluke? His choice will decide the fate of Monday the 23rd.
